name: QuestYsh: The Quest of Young Sheriff
name_original: QuestYsh: The Quest of Young Sheriff
description:
QuestYsh: The Quest of Young Sheriff is a 15 minute homage to the original Legend of Zelda on the NES! You play as the Young Sheriff, who has to save his town from the invasion of strange monsters! I guess...

NO SOUND, sorry, just didn't have the time or motivation tbh 

Controls

  • W, A, S, D for Moving around
  • K for Using an Item, Interacting with NPCs and Chests and whatnot.
  • I for Inventory

QuestYsh is Game III in a series of short minigames I'll be releasing throughout the year. Each game will pay homage to a different era in video game history. QuestYsh was clearly inspired by The Legend of Zelda on the NES, down to the tight movement, the jerky enemies and the dungeon design :) 

 Game III - [late 1980s]

Total Dev Time: 8 days.

TIPS, NOTES

-> If your weapon doesn't  seem to hurt an enemy, try a different weapon

-> Not polished, inventory button's a little twitchy.

-> Stuck? If you're literally stuck, I messed something up, (not polished), if you just don't know where to go, ask :)

-> Not polished

If you're a publisher (yeah right), give me money, I'll give you QuestYsh 2 

if you make game music, send me a Twitter DM, I might hire you for this game's soundtrack :)
